mainBoard.flavorText:
"The darkness crawls with vampires and ghouls, but we are not without allies."
—Mikaeus, the Lunarch

mainBoard.name: Abbey Griffin

mainBoard.flavorText: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ajani reist dorthin, wo er am meisten gebraucht wird, und wir kümmern uns in seinem Namen um seine Heimat."
foreignData.name: Ajanis Sonnenkämpferin
foreignData.text: Lebensverknüpfung (Schaden, der von dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, lässt dich ebenso viele Lebenspunkte dazu erhalten.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Ajani viaja adonde más se lo necesita, y en su nombre mantenemos a salvo sus tierras."
foreignData.name: Golpeasol de Ajani
foreignData.text: Vínculo vital. (El daño hecho por esta criatura también hace que ganes esa misma cantidad de vidas.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Ajani part là où sa présence est la plus nécessaire et c'est en son nom que nous protégeons ses terres. »
foreignData.name: Frappesoleil d'Ajani
foreignData.text: Lien de vie (Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Ajani va dove hanno più bisogno di lui e in suo nome proteggiamo le sue terre."
foreignData.name: Protettrice Solare di Ajani
foreignData.text: Legame vitale (Il danno inflitto da questa creatura ti fa anche guadagnare altrettanti punti vita.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「アジャニは行かねばならないところに行き、我々は彼の名の下に彼の土地を守る。」
foreignData.name: アジャニの陽光弾手
foreignData.text: 絆魂（このクリーチャーがダメージを与える場合、さらにあなたはその点数分のライフを得る。）

foreignData.flavorText: "아자니는 그를 제일 필요로 하는 곳으로 가며, 우리는 그를 위해 그의 영역을 돌보지."

foreignData.text: 생명연결 (이 생물이 피해를 입히면, 이 생물의 조종자는 그 피해만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Ajani vai para onde mais precisam dele, e em seu nome mantemos suas terras em segurança."

foreignData.text: Vínculo com a vida(O dano causado por esta criatura faz com que você ganhe uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Аджани там, где он нужен больше всего, и от его имени мы защищаем его земли».
foreignData.name: Солнечный Защитник Аджани
foreignData.text: Цепь жизни (Повреждения, наносимые этим существом, также заставляют вас получить такое же количество жизней.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「阿耶尼会在最需要他的地方现身，而我们以其名立誓维护其领地安全。」

mainBoard.originalText: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
mainBoard.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Death has bound it with chains of past regrets. Forever it searches for atonement, each kindness removing a single link.

foreignData.flavorText: Das Bedauern des Vergangenen sind die Ketten, mit dem der Tod ihn gefesselt hat. Jetzt sucht er nach Vergebung; jede gute Tat entfernt ein einzelnes Kettenglied.
foreignData.name: Kapellengeist
foreignData.text: Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: La muerte lo ha atado con cadenas de errores pasados. Busca expiarse, quitando un eslabón con cada buena acción.
foreignData.name: Geist de la capilla
foreignData.text: Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: La mort l'emprisonne dans les chaînes des regrets de son passé. Il passe l'éternité à essayer de se racheter, chaque acte de bonté détachant un maillon.
foreignData.name: Geist de chapelle
foreignData.text: Vol

foreignData.flavorText: La morte lo ha legato con catene dei rimpianti passati. Per sempre cercherà l'espiazione, con ogni gentilezza che elimina un vincolo.
foreignData.name: Geist della Cappella
foreignData.text: Volare

foreignData.flavorText: 死はそれを後悔の鎖で縛る。 それは永遠に贖罪を求め続け、善行一つが鎖の輪を一つ取り除く。
foreignData.name: 礼拝堂の霊
foreignData.text: 飛行
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText: 죽음은 그것을 회한의 사슬로 묶어놓았다. 그것은 영원히 속죄를 구하며, 선행을 할 때마다 사슬은 한 개씩 사라진다.
foreignData.name: 예배당 심령
foreignData.text: 비행

foreignData.flavorText: A morte o amarrou com correntes de arrependimentos do passado. Em sua eterna busca pela expiação, cada gesto de gentileza remove um elo.
foreignData.name: Geist da Capela
foreignData.text: Voar

foreignData.flavorText: Смерть одела на него оковы раскаяния. Он бродит в вечном поиске прощения, и каждое проявление доброты уничтожает одно звено его цепей.
foreignData.name: Привидение Часовни
foreignData.text: Полет

foreignData.flavorText: 死亡让它被过往悔恨重重炼住。 它永远寻求着赎罪机会，每个善念都会移除一条束缚。
foreignData.name: 礼拜堂游魂
foreignData.text: 飞行

foreignData.flavorText: 死亡讓它被過往悔恨重重鍊住。 它永遠尋求著贖罪機會，每個善念都會移除一條束縛。
foreignData.name: 禮拜堂遊魂
foreignData.text: 飛行

mainBoard.name: Guardian Lions
mainBoard.originalText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
mainBoard.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "No life is without meaning. No living thing is too small to be strong."

foreignData.flavorText: „Kein Leben ist bedeutungslos. Kein lebendes Wesen ist zu klein, um stark zu sein."
foreignData.name: Heiler des Rudels
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ninguna vida carece de sentido. Nada que esté vivo es tan pequeño como para que no pueda ser fuerte."
foreignData.name: Sanadora de la manada
foreignData.text: Siempre que otra criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, ganas 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Toute forme de vie a un sens. Tout être vivant, si petit soit-il, a la force. »
foreignData.name: Guérisseuse de la bande
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nessuna vita è priva di significato. Nessun essere vivente è troppo piccolo per essere grande."
foreignData.name: Guaritrice del Branco
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「意味のない命などありません。小さすぎるからといって強くなれない生き物もいません。」
foreignData.name: 群れの癒し手
foreignData.text: 他のクリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猫・クレリック

foreignData.flavorText: "이 세상에 의미 없는 삶이란 없으며, 살아 있는 것은 그 크기가 아무리 보잘것없어도 얼마든지 강할 수 있다."
foreignData.name: 사자무리 치유사
foreignData.text: 다른 생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nenhuma vida é insignificante. Nenhuma criatura viva é pequena demais para ser forte."
foreignData.name: Curandeiro do Bando
foreignData.text: Toda vez que outra criatura entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: «Всякая жизнь имеет смысл. И всякий живущий, как мал бы он ни был, может быть сильным».
foreignData.name: Целительница Прайда
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда другое существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: 「这世界不存在没有意义的生命。再渺小的生命也可以很强大。」
foreignData.name: 狮群治疗师
foreignData.text: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你获得2点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 「這世界不存在沒有意義的生命。再渺小的生命也可以很強大。」

foreignData.text: 每當另一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，你獲得2點生命。

mainBoard.flavorText:
"In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths."
—Ajani Goldmane

foreignData.flavorText: „In der Wildnis ist ein weißes Fell wie meines eine Fehlentwicklung. Uns fehlt die natürliche Tarnung, doch dadurch treten andere Stärken stärker zutage." —Ajani Goldmähne
foreignData.name: Silberfell-Löwe

foreignData.flavorText: "En la selva, el pelaje blanco como el mío es una aberración. No tenemos camuflaje natural, pero la imposibilidad de esconderse alienta otras virtudes." —Ajani Melena Dorada
foreignData.name: León manto plateado

foreignData.flavorText: « Dans la nature, une fourrure blanche comme la mienne est une aberration. Le camouflage naturel nous fait défaut, mais son absence encourage chez nous le développement d'autres forces. » —Ajani Crinièredor
foreignData.name: Lion à fourrure argentée

foreignData.flavorText: "Nelle zone selvagge, la pelliccia bianca come la mia è un'aberrazione. Ci manca il mimetismo naturale, ma l'incapacità di nasconderci affina altre caratteristiche." —Ajani Criniera D'Oro
foreignData.name: Leone dal Manto Argentato

foreignData.flavorText: 「荒野では、私のような白い毛は常軌を逸している。自然に隠れることはできぬが、隠れられない事が別な力をもたらすのだ。」 ――黄金のたてがみのアジャニ
foreignData.name: 銀毛のライオン

foreignData.flavorText: "야생에서 나처럼 하얀 털을 가진 생물은 돌연변이에 속한다. 우리는 자연에 숨어 몸을 위장할 수는 없지만, 대신 필연적으로 다른 힘을 기를 수 있었지." —아자니 골드메인
foreignData.name: 은가죽 사자

mainBoard.name: Elixir of Immortality
mainBoard.originalText: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

rulings.text: Paying the activation cost of Elixir of Immortality’s ability doesn’t cause it to leave the battlefield. If you have a way to untap it, you can activate the ability multiple times in response to itself.
As the ability resolves, you’ll shuffle Elixir of Immortality into its owner’s library directly from the battlefield, if it’s still there.

If Elixir of Immortality is in your graveyard at the time the ability resolves, you’ll still wind up shuffling it into your library because you shuffle your entire graveyard into your library. If it’s anywhere else by that time, including in another player’s graveyard, it remains where it is and you shuffle just your graveyard into your library.

If you gain control of another player’s Elixir of Immortality and activate it, the Elixir of Immortality will be shuffled into its owner’s library and the cards in your graveyard will be shuffled into your library. You are considered to have shuffled each affected library (even if, as a shortcut, each player physically shuffles their own library).

mainBoard.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

mainBoard.name: Divine Verdict
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

rulings.text: A “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.

An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.
Destroying a blocking creature won't cause any of the creatures it was blocking to become unblocked. They won't deal combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker (unless they have trample).

mainBoard.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
